TheValue: The Value Custodian for a Decentralized World
subtitle: Core Coin is an open source, public Blockchain application platform featuring one of the most secure smart contract functionality.
title: main benefits of
decentralizationText: Core distributed computing platform is reliable, secure and available for everyone.
securityText: Twisted Edwards curve — Edwards448 — 224-bit //Spinal Tap-grade// security level.
interoperabilityText: Connecting the World using Oracles and distributing Financial instruments through Smart Contracts.
persistenceText: Immutable Blockchain transactions are stored in tamper-proof P2P ledgers.
coverageText: Borderless network anywhere in the World run on various networks.
swarmIntelligenceText: Core Blockchain is using a self-organized system — Boids — to transact and route the data.

tabs.tabsContent: A secure financial messaging service on the Core Blockchain network to send and receive encrypted messages as well as make payments without borders. Secure Smart Contracts — Ylem — empowers Core Blockchain to transfer/digitize that of value on the powerful Core Blockchain network.
Protection and automatization of medical data and active participation in research for medicine or treatment. Monitoring and tracking diseases with verified data.
Aerospace operators could share data about aircraft history, maintenance, and operations with verified Blockchain messages.
Optimizing IoT and small devices participating in the mining network and algorithm //RandomY//. We are using ZERO-waste — 0W — energy with structure LIFO //Last-In-First-Out//.

Management and Resilience in Supply Chain to track, monitor, and alert using Blockchain-based verified information. Blockchain reduces the length of the chain to some extent by cutting down on middlemen or 3rd party organizations.
Blockchain-based transparent, immutable eGov //digital Government// solution for G2 //Government-to// services served Worldwide.
Enable Indie-producers //Low-budget// and microfinance for movies and entertainment. Monetize content utilizing fast & secure real-time Core payments.
Core Blockchain is contributing to Geographic information science //GIScience// to build a digital trust platform that can be used for multiple industries.
Core Blockchain is able to serve for an Autonomous Pod Data Transport //APDT// and connect multiple devices with the reliable and secure Core Blockchain Network globally.
Following the concept of using Blockchain technology to secure assets and host multiple securities on the Core Blockchain platform.
Blockchain can actively contribute to education by involving the process of learning facilitation, or the acquisition of knowledge, skills, values, beliefs, and habits.
Blockchain messages and data distribution within different types of communication - including radio-frequency //RF//, mesh network //meshnet// and laser transmission.

SOLUTIONS.title: Core Blockchain
SOLUTIONS.description: Our mission is building a Global Decentralized Network //GDN// to cover all areas on the planet using multiple communication technologies along with Core Blockchain platform. We are creating an Inclusion program suited for all people.
SOLUTIONS.text: A decentralized structure within the whole ecosystem allowing voting through the CORE FOUNDATION. We are inviting any new ideas for the Blockchain. Blockchain has a program to award projects — Core Community Fund //CCF// — deemed to be beneficial for the network.

tabs.tabText: Explore the interface between a set of APIs, SDKs, or other interactive digital tools and their various stakeholders. Connect Blockchain using Oracles to your running system. Interact with Blockchain Worldwide network.
Discuss and open new QA in the Talk community. Developers as well as another community members will assist you answer your questions.

The Core community has adopted many standards that are helpful for developers. Typically these are introduced as Core Improvement Proposals //CIP//. CIP's describe standards for the Core platform, including core protocol specifications, client APIs, and contract standards.

NODECOVERAGE.title: covered by
NODECOVERAGE.description: Core Blockchain can operate on various platforms and environments - including mesh networks, satellite streams, mobile internet connection and more.

CONTACTS.description: We optimize the mining algorithm to be more focused on small devices //IoT// and connected to mesh network ecosystem. Meshnet is Blockchain topology - connecting nodes and transmit various data into established and new devices.

FOOTER.copyRights: Copyright © 2018-2020 Core Foundation. All Rights Reserved.

LANGUAGE_PAGE.title: Language Support
LANGUAGE_PAGE.description: We are serving all people Worldwide, any language any nationality. Please, contribute to translations to make this vision a reality.
LANGUAGE_PAGE.languageInProgress: The following language translations are in progress:
LANGUAGE_PAGE.translationDescription: Core Blockchain translators are always translating pages in as many languages as possible. To see what they're working on right now or to sign up or to join them.
LANGUAGE_PAGE.translationText: Interested in translating? Get involved! We're seeking volunteers to join translation community.
LANGUAGE_PAGE.joinListTwo: You will need to create a Translate account if you don’t already have one.
LANGUAGE_PAGE.joinListThree: Find the language you want to translate and select a document.
LANGUAGE_PAGE.joinListFour: If translation progress is below 100%, please contribute! Don’t see your language listed?
LANGUAGE_PAGE.joinListFive: Once you’ve completed the translation, our professional translation service will review (and potentially edit) the content.
LANGUAGE_PAGE.joinListSix: Once the review is complete (i.e. review progress is 100%), we will add it to the website.

CoreWalletBlock.description: The Core Wallet allows you to hold and secure Core and other crypto-assets built on Core, as well as write, deploy and use Smart Contracts.

devicesList: Antenna & Amplifier //required by Luna° mesh connectivity//

AndroidMiners.title: Core CPU miners
AndroidMiners.description: By mining, you can earn cryptocurrency with your CPU hashing power. CPU-based miners to start dig your Ores.

GETSTARTED.coreNetworkDescription: We are monitoring network and provide the tools to monitor the health and track your transactions

NodeStatus.description: Charts and metrics for the Core network. Explore our Boid locations Worldwide.

CoreTransaction.title: Transaction Explorer
CoreTransaction.description: Core Block Explorer is a web tool that provides detailed information about Core blocks, addresses, and transactions.
